articles.author: Mark Krutov, Kyrylo Ovsyaniy
articles.title: As Ukrainian Troops Advance In Kherson, A Glimpse Of The Russian Withdrawal - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
articles.description: Ukrainian forces are advancing in the southern Kherson region, pummeling Russian forces and pushing toward the city of Kherson, whose recapture would be a major victory. Social-media photos and videos posted by troops leaving the right bank of the Dneiper Riv…
articles.content: The photograph, showing a man in combat fatigues posing on a river ferry alongside Russian military equipment, was posted on Russian social media on October 10. Three days later, a video that appeare… [+6717 chars]
